Arme los datos de la siguiente manera
En general los nombres de data frame arrancan con el nombre del modelo, despues dicen cual es el experimento y finalmente aclaran si se trata de datos estructurales (area y entropia shanon) o datos de concentraciones (data).
Por ejemplo:
**VesicularT0CisternAreaData**


$\bullet$ Los datos frames que terminan con AreaData son datos de cisternArea.csv
$\bullet$ Los datos frames que terminan con Data son datos ResultsIntrTransp3.csv
$\bullet$ Luego armamos matrices con los datos, esto aun no esta automatizado para tomar todos los .csv's que haya en una carpeta.


```{r eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
#F = Fusion Homotipica
CisternsAreaNames <-list.files(path = "/home/user/Desktop/Pasantia/datos_franco/vesicular_conFhomo/resultados vesicular 7-7/", pattern = "cisternsArea*", full.names = T)

VesicularTCisternAreaData<-data.frame(matrix(nrow=150,ncol=64))
for (i in 1:length(CisternsAreaNames)){
  if(i!=1){ 
  SubjectDataM<-read.csv(CisternsAreaNames[i],header=TRUE,sep=",")
  VesicularTCisternAreaData<-bind_cols(VesicularTCisternAreaData,SubjectDataM)
  
  
  }
  else if (i==1){VesicularTCisternAreaData<-(SubjectDataM<-read.csv(CisternsAreaNames[i],header=TRUE,sep=","))
 }}
#write.csv(VesciularT5CisternAreaData,'/home/user/Desktop/Pasantia/FroozenEndosomes/5cisternas/VesciularT5CisternAreaData',row.names = T)
VesicularTFCisternAreaData<-VesicularTCisternAreaData
```

*VesicularArea*
```{r banderaVesicularMean echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

C2<-rowMeans(VesicularTFCisternAreaData[,c("RabB","RabB1","RabB2","RabB3","RabB4","RabB5","RabB6","RabB7","RabB8","RabB9")])
C3<-rowMeans(VesicularTFCisternAreaData[,c("RabC","RabC1","RabC2","RabC3","RabC4","RabC5","RabC6","RabC7","RabC8","RabC9")])
C4<-rowMeans(VesicularTFCisternAreaData[,c("RabD","RabD1","RabD2","RabD3","RabD4","RabD5","RabD6","RabD7","RabD8","RabD9")])
C5<-rowMeans(VesicularTFCisternAreaData[,c("RabE","RabE1","RabE2","RabE3","RabE4","RabE5","RabE6","RabE7","RabE8","RabE9")])
C1<-rowMeans(VesicularTFCisternAreaData[,c("RabA","RabA1","RabA2","RabA3","RabA4","RabA5","RabA6","RabA7","RabA8","RabA9")])

dataframepromedioD1CisternArea<-data.frame(C5,C4,C3,C2,C1)
n<-length(dataframepromedioD1CisternArea$C1)*100
ticks<-seq(100,n,by=100)
dataframepromedioD1CisternArea$ticks<-ticks
d1<-melt(dataframepromedioD1CisternArea,id.vars="ticks")
CisternAreaGrafPromedio<-ggplot(d1, aes(x=ticks, y=value, fill=variable)) + geom_area()+labs(x="",y="")+ scale_fill_manual(values = c("C1" = "blue", "C2" = "skyblue2","C3"="green4","C4"="red","C5"="yellow"))+theme_classic()+scale_x_continuous(breaks= c(0,15000,30000,45000,60000))+theme(legend.key.size = unit(3, "cm"))+theme(legend.position="none",axis.ticks.length=unit(0.5, "cm"),legend.title=element_blank(),axis.text =element_blank(),axis.line = element_line(size=3),axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "black", size = 3),text=element_text(size = 30))
#+theme(legend.title=element_blank())+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.7))+theme(axis.text.x =element_blank())+theme(axis.text.y = element_blank())+theme(legend.text = element_text(size =75 ))+theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 80))+theme(axis.line = element_line(size=3))+theme(axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "black", size = 3))
CisternAreaGrafPromedio
ggsave("BanderaVesicularMean.png",plot = CisternAreaGrafPromedio, width = 130, height = 100, dpi = 150, units = "mm", device='png')
```
